mapper.select: select a.id as id, u.name, a.uploader_id, left (a.title, 100) as title, a.trans_title, left (a.original_text, 100) as original_text, a.genre, a.has_trans, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.create_time) as create_time, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.update_time) as update_time, stats.like_num, stats.view_num, stats.comment_num, stats.trans_request_num from user u join article a on u.id = a.uploader_id join article_stats stats on a.id = stats.article_id ${ew.customSqlSegment}
